DellJob.description: This resource contains information about a specific configuration Job scheduled by or being executed by a Redfish service's Job Service.
DellJob.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a Job for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CompletionTime.description: This property represents completion time of Job.
CompletionTime.longDescription: The value of this property represents when the job was completed.

EndTime.description: This property represents End time of Job.
EndTime.longDescription: This is the timestamp until when the service will wait for a job to complete. If a job did not complete within this time, it will be killed and marked as failed. TIME_NA is a default value that implies EndTime is not applicable. It is optional for clients to specify this property when creating a job.

JobState.longDescription: The value of the property specifies the State of the Job.

JobType.description: This property represent configuration type of job.
JobType.longDescription: The value of this property will be one of the possible configuration type of job.

Message.description: The status Message for the Job.
Message.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the status message for the Job.

MessageArgs.description: This array of message arguments are substituted for the arguments in the message.
MessageArgs.longDescription: This property shall contain the message substitution arguments for the specific message referenced by the MessageId and shall only be included if the MessageId is present.

MessageId.description: The Message Id of the Job.
MessageId.longDescription: The value of this property the Message Id of the Job.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

PercentComplete.description: The percentage completion of the Job.
PercentComplete.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the percentage completion of the Job.

StartTime.description: This property represents start time of Job.
StartTime.longDescription: This property will be defined as a String that will contain a timestamp in Edm.DateTime format. TIME_NOW is a default value that implies apply pending configuration now. This property will be required when creating a job with future timestamp.

TargetSettingsURI.description: This property will be resource uri of settings object.
TargetSettingsURI.longDescription: The value of this property will be the URI of a target resource on which the configuration is being applied. This property will be required when creating a job. This Property will be null on GET operation.

enumDescriptions.Completed: A job is in completed state
enumDescriptions.New: A job is in newly created state
enumDescriptions.Running: A job is in running state
enumDescriptions.Scheduled: A job is in scheduled state

enumDescriptions.ExportConfiguration: A server configuration profile export job
enumDescriptions.ImportConfiguration: A server configuration profile import job
enumDescriptions.LCConfig: A lifecyle controller attribute configuration job
enumDescriptions.LCExport: A lifecyle controller log export job
enumDescriptions.LCLogExport: A lifecyle controller log export job
enumDescriptions.RealTimeNoRebootConfiguration: A real time configuration job without reboot
enumDescriptions.RebootForce: A graceful reboot job with forced shutdown
enumDescriptions.RebootNoForce: A graceful reboot job without forced shutdown
enumDescriptions.RepositoryUpdate: A update job from a repository

title: #DellJob.v1_0_0.DellJob
